Key Match Events: Nick Nastrini pitched six strong innings, allowing one run on three hits and one walk with three strikeouts
Pre-Game Insights: Nastrini worked on refining his mechanics and getting in the zone, which he felt helped him pitch better
Post-Match Reflections: Nastrini credited his work at Charlotte and the help he gained from others, including Dominic Leone and R.C. Lichtenstein, for his successful start
Miscellaneous Highlights: The White Sox have been swept in 21 series and have yet to win a game this season when trailing after six innings (0-65), seven innings (0-80) and eight innings (0-88)
Others: The game was a 2-1 loss to the Rangers, with Nathan Eovaldi allowing just a Gavin Sheets single with 10 strikeouts and two walks over seven innings
